page.title: 01HOUSING IN FORTON
page.content: Most of the older houses are situated on Hollins Lane because this road used to be the main road before the A6 was built in 1824. Most of these houses are cottages and are quite small,because a long time ago people were either very poor or extremly rich and the poor ones could not afford large houses. The houses round the school are more modern,they are mostly semi_detached though there are quite a few detached. There are only 3 people in our class living in terraced houses,most of the terraced houses in Forton are on Coronation Avenue.The houses on this avenue are council houses and can be rented. Most of the semi_detached houses are on Troutbeck Avenue and Lunesdale Drive which are both Cul_de_sacs. {(continued on page 2)}
